info: Rating, 5 stars,  · Today,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
I had a fantastic experience staying at Happy’s Airbnb. The place was exactly as described and even exceeded my expectations. It was clean, comfortable, and well-equipped with everything I needed. The location was perfect.
Happy was incredibly hospitable and responsive, providing excellent recommendations and ensuring that I had a pleasant stay. I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting the area and would love to stay here again in the future.
Thank you for a wonderful stay!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 3 weeks ago,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
I recently stayed at this apartment through Airbnb, and overall, it was a pleasant experience.
Location:
The apartment is conveniently located in a Niketon, making it easy to access local attractions, restaurants, and public transportation. The neighborhood felt safe and vibrant, which added to the enjoyment of my stay.
Cleanliness and Condition:
The apartment was spotless upon arrival. It was clear that the host takes great care in maintaining the space. The furniture and appliances were in excellent condition, and everything worked perfectly.
Amenities Provided:
The apartment was well-equipped with all the necessary amenities. The Wi-Fi was fast and reliable, which was great for both work and entertainment. The kitchen had all the essential supplies, including a washing machine, microwave, gas burner, refrigerator, etc. Additionally, the bathroom was stocked with toiletries, and there were plenty of fresh towels and linens.

The location is great and as described. The apartment was nice, although there were some issues with one of the AC units. I would recommend cleaning the apartment before the next guest checks in. Overall, it was a good place to stay in Nikenton.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: great place to stay for a family. happy was very prompt to response or solve to any question or concerns we had. I would definitely recommend to everyone.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Happy is a an excellent host. He attended to every need we had. House is located in a residential area and you will need to drive out 5-10 mins to get to the hustle and bustle. It’s a huge apartment. Only drawback is the building doesn’t have backup power. I’d recommend this place and host.
